name: Muir 90' Curved White Boucle Sofa by Lawson-Fenning
details: Sofa by Lawson-Fenning has a graceful, arching silhouette, mirrored by bentwood legs that follow its curve. Semi-detached cushions are comfortable and plush, creating an inviting spot to unwind for hours. Satisfyingly chunky ivory boucle feels pleasing to the touch. CB2 exclusive.

name: Muir 90' Camel Velvet Curved Sofa by Lawson-Fenning
details: Sofa by Lawson-Fenning has a graceful arching silhouette, mirrored by bent-wood legs that follow its curve. Semi-detached cushions are comfortable and plush, creating an inviting spot to unwind for hours. Sumptuous camel-toned velvet upholstery feels pleasing to the touch. CB2 exclusive.

name: Muir Curved Sofa Taylor Felt Grey by Lawson-Fenning
details: Sofa by Lawson-Fenning has a graceful arching silhouette, mirrored by bent-wood legs that follow its curve. Semi-detached cushions are comfortable and plush, creating an inviting spot to unwind for hours. Sumptuous camel-toned velvet upholstery feels pleasing to the touch. CB2 exclusive.

name: Muir Swivel Chair Taylor Felt Grey by Lawson-Fenning
details: Swivel chair by Lawson-Fenning draws on the designers' admiration of California interior design in the 1950s and 1960s. Inviting seat fully swivels 360 degrees, appearing to float above a circular base of wood certified sustainable by the Forest Stewardship Council ®. CB2 exclusive.

name: Muir Camel Velvet Swivel Chair by Lawson-Fenning
details: Swivel chair by Lawson-Fenning draws on the designers' admiration of California interior design in the 1950s and 1960s. Inviting seat fully swivels 360 degrees, appearing to float above a circular base of wood certified sustainable by the Forest Stewardship Council ®. Sumptuous camel-colored velvet finishes things off with a luxurious midcentury-inspired moment. CB2 exclusive.
